Header: New DG at Civil Security Department Calls on Commander
Content: Rear Admiral (Retd) Ananda Peiris, Director General, Civil Security Department (CSD) on Tuesday (14) paid a courtesy call on the acting Chief of Defence Staff & Commander of the Army, Lieutenant General Shavendra Silva at the Army Headquarters. This was the first formal visit he made to the Commanderâ€™s office after he was appointed to the office of the Director General, CSD. During the cordial meeting, both of them exchanged views on matters of concern to them. At the end of the courtesy call, Lieutenant General Silva awarded a memento to the visiting CSD as a token of goodwill and appreciation.
